summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new Agenda/Events feature. All 22 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend features verified working: Agenda page with hero and category filters, Homepage 'Prochains événements' section with 4 events and 'Voir tout l'agenda' link, Footer Agenda link, Mobile menu Agenda link, Search indexing for 'Agenda', and Admin dashboard Events tab with full CRUD functionality.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/events returns list of 5 events ✅
Backend: GET /api/events?category=Liturgie filters correctly ✅
Backend: GET /api/events?category=Communauté filters correctly ✅
Backend: GET /api/events?category=Jeunesse filters correctly ✅
Backend: GET /api/events?category=Solidarité filters correctly ✅
Backend: GET /api/events?category=Formation filters correctly ✅
Backend: GET /api/events?include_past=true works ✅
Backend: POST /api/events requires auth (401 without token) ✅
Backend: POST /api/events creates event with auth ✅
Backend: PUT /api/events/{id} requires auth ✅
Backend: PUT /api/events/{id} updates event with auth ✅
Backend: PUT /api/events/{fake_id} returns 404 ✅
Backend: DELETE /api/events/{id} requires auth ✅
Backend: DELETE /api/events/{id} deletes event with auth ✅
Backend: DELETE /api/events/{fake_id} returns 404 ✅
Backend: Auth login with admin/admin123 works ✅
Backend: Auth login with wrong credentials returns 401 ✅
Backend: 5 seed events exist with correct data ✅
Frontend: Agenda page loads with hero section ✅
Frontend: Agenda page shows category filter buttons (Tous, Liturgie, Communauté, Jeunesse, Solidarité, Formation) ✅
Frontend: Agenda page displays 5 event cards grouped by month ✅
Frontend: Category filter buttons work - clicking 'Liturgie' shows 1 event, clicking 'Tous' shows all 5 ✅
Frontend: Homepage 'Prochains événements' section displays 4 events ✅
Frontend: 'Voir tout l'agenda' link navigates to /agenda ✅
Frontend: Footer has 'Agenda' link in 'Accès rapide' section ✅
Frontend: Mobile menu has 'Agenda' link with Calendar icon ✅
Frontend: Search for 'Agenda' returns 1 result and navigates to /agenda ✅
Frontend: Admin dashboard has 'Événements' tab ✅
Frontend: Admin Events form has all required fields (title, description, date, time, end_time, location, category) ✅
Frontend: Admin Events tab shows list of existing events ✅
Frontend: Admin can create new event via form (toast shows 'Événement créé') ✅
seed_data_creation: 5 test events already exist: Messe de la Chandeleur (March 15, Liturgie), Repas partagé de Carême (March 22, Communauté), Groupe de jeunes (March 28, Jeunesse), Collecte alimentaire (April 5, Solidarité), Parcours Alpha (April 10, Formation)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Agenda/Events feature is fully implemented and working. Backend test file /app/backend/tests/test_events_api.py covers all CRUD operations and can be used for regression testing. Admin dashboard has 4 tabs: Actualités, Horaires des messes, Funérailles, Événements - all functional. The site is in French with proper localization.

agenda_page.hero: Working - shows 'Agenda paroissial' title with Calendar icon
agenda_page.category_filters: Working - 6 filter buttons (Tous, Liturgie, Communauté, Jeunesse, Solidarité, Formation)
agenda_page.event_cards: Working - displays events grouped by month with date badge, title, description, time, location
